webscraper.models module¶

class webscraper.models.Items(*args, **kwargs)¶

Bases: django.db.models.base.Model

Class for storing a single movie in a single List for a single User

Functions and methods:

  • __str__

Parameters

  • list (models.ForeignKey(List)) – List of which this item is a part of

  • user (models.ForeignKey(User)) – User in whose list this movie exists

  • text (models.CharField()) – Text storing name of the movie corresponding to this object

exception DoesNotExist¶

Bases: django.core.exceptions.ObjectDoesNotExist

exception MultipleObjectsReturned¶

Bases: django.core.exceptions.MultipleObjectsReturned

id¶

A wrapper for a deferred-loading field. When the value is read from this object the first time, the query is executed.

list¶

Accessor to the related object on the forward side of a many-to-one or one-to-one (via ForwardOneToOneDescriptor subclass) relation.

In the example:

class Child(Model):
    parent = ForeignKey(Parent, related_name='children')

Child.parent is a ForwardManyToOneDescriptor instance.

class webscraper.models.List(*args, **kwargs)¶

Bases: django.db.models.base.Model

Class for storing three types of lists (watched, watchlist, liked) for every user

Functions and methods:

  • __str__

Parameters

type (models.CharField()) – Type of content which the list stores, can be watched, watchlist, liked

exception DoesNotExist¶

Bases: django.core.exceptions.ObjectDoesNotExist

exception MultipleObjectsReturned¶

Bases: django.core.exceptions.MultipleObjectsReturned

id¶

A wrapper for a deferred-loading field. When the value is read from this object the first time, the query is executed.

items_set¶

Accessor to the related objects manager on the reverse side of a many-to-one relation.

In the example:

class Child(Model):
    parent = ForeignKey(Parent, related_name='children')

Parent.children is a ReverseManyToOneDescriptor instance.

Most of the implementation is delegated to a dynamically defined manager class built by create_forward_many_to_many_manager() defined below.

objects = <django.db.models.manager.Manager object>¶
type¶

A wrapper for a deferred-loading field. When the value is read from this object the first time, the query is executed.

class webscraper.models.MovieData(*args, **kwargs)¶

Bases: django.db.models.base.Model

Class for storing movies inside the database

Functions and methods:

  • __str__

Parameters

  • name (models.CharField()) – Name of the movie

  • site_link (models.JSONField()) – Links to IMDb, Rotten Tomatoes, and Metacritic pages of the movie

  • rating (models.JSONField()) – Ratings on IMDb, Rotten Tomatoes, and Metacritic for the movie

  • plot (models.CharField()) – Short description of the movie plot

  • language (models.JSONField()) – Languages the movie is available in

  • similar (models.JSONField()) – Movies similar to this one

  • year_of_release (models.IntegerField()) – Year of release of the movie

  • duration (models.InegerField()) – Duration in minutes of the movie

  • genre (models.JSONField()) – Genres in which the movie belongs

  • cast (models.JSONField()) – Cast of the movie

  • reviews (models.JSONField()) – Reviews (5 good and 5 bad) for the movie

  • platform (models.JSONField()) – Platforms on which user can watch the movie

  • image_url (models.CharField()) – Link to movie poster

webscraper.tests module¶

webscraper.urls module¶

URLs and their corresponding views stored here

webscraper.views module¶

Stores all views/functions involved in the webscraper app

webscraper.views.home(response)¶

Home page of the project, displays current top 10 movies, and the watched, liked, and watchlist movies and tv shows for the user. Also displays recommended movies based on the movies similar to the user’s liked movies which havent been watched by user yet

webscraper.views.index(response, id)¶

Renders the movie page corresponding to the id

Parameters

id (int) – id of the movie

webscraper.views.save_movies(response)¶

Scrapes movies from top 1000 list, in multiples of 50

webscraper.views.save_tvshows(response)¶

Scrapes tv shows from top 1000 list, in multiples of 50

webscraper.views.search_page_view(response)¶

Searches user query within the database, if it doesnt exist, scrapes atmost 2 movies and 2 tv shows online, and displays search results

webscraper.views.temp(response)¶

Redirects to home page
